SELECT HSEP.ENTRUST_ID, HSEP.ENTRUST_CODE, HSEP.ENTRUST_NAME, HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER, HSEP.PRICE_DECIMAL, HSEP.MIN_AGENCY_FEE, HSEP.SALESMAN_ID, HSEP.STATEMENT_FLAG, HE.NAME SALESMAN_NAME,
FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP LEFT JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE HE ON HSEP.SALESMAN_ID = HE.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND HSEP.ENTRUST_ID = #{entrustId}
AND HSEP.ENTRUST_CODE like '%'||#{entrustCode}||'%'
AND HSEP.ENTRUST_NAME like '%'||#{entrustName}||'%'
AND HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER like '%'||#{serialNumber}||'%'
ORDER BY HSEP.ENTRUST_ID DESC

SELECT HSEP.ENTRUST_ID, HSEP.ENTRUST_CODE, HSEP.ENTRUST_NAME, HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER, HSEP.PRICE_DECIMAL, HSEP.MIN_AGENCY_FEE, HSEP.SALESMAN_ID FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP
AND UPPER(HSEP.ENTRUST_CODE) like '%'|| UPPER(#{entrustCode}) ||'%'
AND UPPER(HSEP.ENTRUST_NAME) like '%'|| UPPER(#{entrustName}) ||'%'
AND UPPER(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) like '%'|| UPPER(#{serialNumber})||'%'

SELECT HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE HE ON HSEP.SALESMAN_ID = HE.EMPLOYEE_ID join SYS_USER SU on SU.EMPLOYEE_ID=HE.EMPLOYEE_ID where SU.USER_ID=#{userId}
AND lower(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'

SELECT round(sum(HSEP.MIN_AGENCY_FEE),2)TOTAL_MIN_AGENCY_FEE FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE HE ON HSEP.SALESMAN_ID = HE.EMPLOYEE_ID join SYS_USER SU on SU.EMPLOYEE_ID=HE.EMPLOYEE_ID where SU.USER_ID=#{userId}
AND lower(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'

SELECT HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP where 1=1
AND lower(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'

SELECT round(sum(HSEP.MIN_AGENCY_FEE),2)TOTAL_MIN_AGENCY_FEE FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP where 1=1
AND lower(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) like '%'||lower(#{serialNumber})||'%'
SELECT price_Decimal FROM HCUX_SYS_ENTRUST_PARTY HSEP where lower(HSEP.SERIAL_NUMBER) =lower(#{serialNumber})
SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID FROM SYS_USER SU where SU.USER_ID=#{userId}
